exploit/multi/handler.Name: Generic Payload Handler
exploit/multi/handler.Description: Handles payload connections initiated outside of the Framework

exploit/windows/http/xampp_webdav_upload.Name: XAMPP WebDAV PHP Upload
exploit/windows/http/xampp_webdav_upload.Description: Exploits XAMPP WebDAV to upload a PHP shell using valid credentials

payload/php/unix/reverse_php.Name: Unix PHP Reverse Shell

payload/php/windows/reverse_php.Name: Windows PHP Reverse Shell
